## IButtonClickOptions interface

Options for prompting a player to click on a `Button`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IButtonClickOptions extends IClickOptions 
```
**Extends:** [IClickOptions](./bge-core.iclickoptions.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [message?](./bge-core.ibuttonclickoptions.message.md) |  | [Message](./bge-core.message.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional message to display to the prompted player. You'll need to include the button somewhere in the message, otherwise the player can't click it! Defaults to just showing the button. |
